verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> another <WG243> sign <WG4592> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, great <WG3173> and <WG2532> marvellous <WG2298>, seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> having <WG2192> <WG5723> the seven <WG2033> last <WG2078> plagues <WG4127>; for <WG3754> in <WG1722> them <WG846> is filled up <WG5055> <WG5681> the wrath <WG2372> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> as it were <WG5613> a sea <WG2281> of glass <WG5193> mingled <WG3396> <WG5772> with fire <WG4442>: and <WG2532> them that had gotten the victory <WG3528> <WG5723> over <WG1537> the beast <WG2342>, and <WG2532> over <WG1537> his <WG846> image <WG1504>, and <WG2532> over <WG1537> his <WG846> mark <WG5480>, and over <WG1537> the number <WG706> of his <WG846> name <WG3686>, stand <WG2476> <WG5761> on <WG1909> the sea <WG2281> of glass <WG5193>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> the harps <WG2788> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> they sing <WG103> <WG5719> the song <WG5603> of Mosheh <WG3475> the servant <WG1401> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> the song <WG5603> of the Lamb <WG721>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Great <WG3173> and <WG2532> marvellous <WG2298> are thy <WG4675> works <WG2041>, YY <WG2962> 'Elohim <WG2316> Almighty <WG3841>; just <WG1342> and <WG2532> true <WG228> are thy <WG4675> ways <WG3598>, thou King <WG935> of saints <WG40>.

Who <WG5101> shall <WG5399> not <WG3364> fear <WG5399> <WG5680> thee <WG4571>, O YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> glorify <WG1392> <WG5661> thy <WG4675> name <WG3686>? for <WG3754> thou only <WG3441> art holy <WG3741>: for <WG3754> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> shall come <WG2240> <WG5692> and <WG2532> worship <WG4352> <WG5692> before <WG1799> thee <WG4675>; for <WG3754> thy <WG4675> judgments <WG1345> are made manifest <WG5319> <WG5681>.

And <WG2532> after <WG3326> that <WG5023> I looked <WG1492> <WG5627>, and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, the temple <WG3485> of the tabernacle <WG4633> of the testimony <WG3142> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> was opened <WG455> <WG5648>:

And <WG2532> the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> came <WG1831> <WG5627> out of <WG1537> the temple <WG3485>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> the seven <WG2033> plagues <WG4127>, clothed <WG1746> <WG5765> in pure <WG2513> and <WG2532> white <WG2986> linen <WG3043>, and <WG2532> having their breasts <WG4738> girded <WG4024> <WG5772> with <WG4012> golden <WG5552> girdles <WG2223>.

And <WG2532> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> the four <WG5064> beasts <WG2226> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> unto the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> seven <WG2033> golden <WG5552> vials <WG5357> full <WG1073> <WG5723> of the wrath <WG2372> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, who <WG3588> liveth <WG2198> <WG5723> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>.

And <WG2532> the temple <WG3485> was filled <WG1072> <WG5681> with smoke <WG2586> from <WG1537> the glory <WG1391> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> from <WG1537> his <WG846> power <WG1411>; and <WG2532> no man <WG3762> was able <WG1410> <WG5711> to enter <WG1525> <WG5629> into <WG1519> the temple <WG3485>, till <WG891> the seven <WG2033> plagues <WG4127> of the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> were fulfilled <WG5055> <WG5686>.
